titleStmt.title: [The image of bothe churches after reulacion of saynt Iohan the euangelyst]
titleStmt.author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.

notesStmt.note: In two parts; the second part has separate register and title page which reads: The seconde part of the Image of both churches .. .
Running title reads: The image of both churches.
On I7r-v of part 2, is mentioned: thys present yeare..M. CCCCC.xlv--STC.
Identified as STC 1302 on UMI microfilm, reel 23.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
